name: Nodle Nebula
description:
Connecting & Securing The Next Trillion Things | Nodle is the world’s largest ecosystem of connected devices, providing infrastructure, software, and access to data for the Internet of Things. |
IoT devices connect to smartphones via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). The phone acts as an internet hub for the IoT devices. Cell towers provide internet access to IoT devices via smartphones | The wireless BLE network efficiently uses mobile smartphones to connect to the internet. And in exchange for helping to secure new IoT devices to the network, you'll be rewarded with Nodle cash.
